meta.author: Ricardo Demi Method — FSCBAC Standard
meta.description: Formal mapping between natural-language user queries and developmental intents used by the FSCBAC Center of Truth.
meta.purpose: Convert any natural user phrase into formal age, skills, book types, and developmental parameters.

global_rules.interpretation: Always convert natural queries into formal intents before matching books.
global_rules.age_resolution: If age is mentioned, map to nearest age_group from ages.json. If missing, infer from skill context.
global_rules.skill_resolution: Always use only allowed skills defined in skills.json. Never infer new skills.
global_rules.safety_priority: If query is ambiguous, choose the safest developmental option.
global_rules.origin_priority: Books present in books.json always outrank external books when matching intent parameters.

intents.description: Calming bedtime reading for emotional safety and predictable nighttime routine.

constraints.notes: Strict emotional safety required for ages 1–3.

intents.description: Support early speech development through simple words, repetition, and predictable phrasing.
